pageProduct.name: Alkira Jelly Detox Blue Gum Jelly Cleanser 125ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Pore cleansing. Perfectly effective. Delicately technical. And really cool to use. An innovative charcoal-based jelly cleanser that removes all traces of makeup, excess oil, pollution, and any other grime from the day.

Common Uses

Key Benefits
• A pH balanced vegan jelly cleanser, perfect for daily use
• Complexion correcting and antibacterial Australian native complex of Tasmanian Blue Gum, Lemon and Aniseed Myrtle
• A pore minimising, uneven skin tone correcting and anti-inflammatory combination of Niacinamide and Willow Bark
• Cushioning Coconut Oil and soothing Aloe Vera to leave skin smooth, hydrated and refreshed.
• Antioxidant rich Emu Apply, Tasmanian Pepper Berry and Blackwood Wattle to repair and protect

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Glycerin, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Coco-Glucoside, Cellulose Gum, Niacinamide, Citrus Nobilis (Mandarin Orange) Peel Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Citrus Aurantifolia (Lime) Fruit Extract, Backhousia Citriodora (Lemon Myrtle) Leaf Oil, Charcoal Powder, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Vaccinium Myrtillus (Wild Bilberry) Fruit Extract, Salix Alba (Willow) Bark Extract, Punica Granatum (Pomegranate) Fruit Extract, Epilobium Angustifolium (Willowherb) Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract,  Backhousia Citriodora (Lemon Myrtle) Leaf Extract, Tasmannia Lanceolata (Tasmanian Pepper Berry) Fruit Extract, Kunzea Pomifera (Emu Apple) Fruit Extract, Eucalyptus Globulus (Tasmanian Blue Gum) Leaf Extract, Backhousia Anisata (Aniseed Myrtle) Leaf Extract, Aspalathus Linearis (Rooibos) Leaf Extract, Acacia Melanoxylon (Blackwood Wattle) Leaf Extract, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Sodium Citrate, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Benzyl Alcohol, Citral* Limonene* Allergens

Directions

Squeeze jelly into palm and gently massage over wet or dry skin. Add water to lather. Rinse well and pat dry. Use once or twice daily.
